channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Acti9 PowerTag Link C
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Acti9 PowerTag Link C

item.title: CVE-2022-34754|2024-09-17T02:27:11.795Z -- schneider%20electric -- acti9%20powertag%20link%20c
item.description: A CWE-269: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability exists that could allow elevated functionality when guessing credentials. Affected Products: Acti9 PowerTag Link C (A9XELC10-A) (V1.7.5 and prior), Acti9 PowerTag Link C (A9XELC10-B) (V2.12.0 and prior)
